official_title: To authorize civil actions for certain violations involving depository institutions.
short_title: Savings and Loan Asset Recovery Act

summary.text: Savings and Loan Asset Recovery Act - Amends the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989 to allow a person to bring a civil action to assess a civil penalty for a violation with respect to a federally insured financial institution in the same manner, and subject to the same procedures, as a person may bring an action under Federal law with respect to civil actions for false claims.

titles.title: Savings and Loan Asset Recovery Act
To authorize civil actions for certain violations involving depository institutions.
